resources.string:
General terms and conditions of use of the Marketplace DIGITAL WORLD. is a commercial company domiciled in the Republic of Colombia that makes available on its website www.digitalworl.com/ ("The Site" or "digitalworld.com") a platform ("Marketplace"), which allows the exhibition and commercialization of goods and/or services ("the Products") by national or international sellers acting in their personal capacity and therefore independent from DIGITAL WORLD ("the Sellers"), for the online acquisition of the same by consumers ("Customers" or "Users"). DIGITAL WORLD is therefore not a distributor of the Products offered by the Sellers, does not have any contractual position within the transaction made between Customers and Sellers, nor can it be qualified as a reseller of the products offered by the Sellers in the Marketplace.
Scope of application of the Terms of Use The present general conditions of use of the Marketplace ("Conditions of Use") apply to all orders of Products made by the Users to the Sellers of the Marketplace. The applicable Terms of Use are those in force at the time the order is placed by the User. Likewise, the Seller by the mere fact of exhibiting the Products in the Marketplace confirms the understanding and unconditionally accepts the application of the same.
Capacity to use the platform The services offered in the Marketplace may only be used by persons who have legal capacity to contract in accordance with the provisions of the Colombian legislation in force.
Purchase Process The Users can order the Products offered in the Marketplace directly and independently by the Sellers, which can be clearly identified by a mark in the description of the same or by the expression "Sold by". The description of the Products is provided by the Sellers, who are therefore solely responsible for the completeness of the description provided and the conformity of the Products with such description. By clicking on the "Buy" icon during the order process, after having read the General Conditions of Sale and Return Policy of the Seller indicated at the end of the file of each Product, and having checked the content of the order or, if applicable, after the modification of the same, the User declares to accept fully and without reservation the entirety of the Conditions of Use of the Marketplace.
